Rajkumar, Udta Punjab), as well as his highest opening post-pandemic, beating the 6-7 crores opening of Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya (2024) Tu Yaa Main is struggling at the box office due to the lack of star pull and the sheer amount of screens that have been alloted to O'Romeo.
